title: Track our progress: Trade Remedies Authority case milestones – Feb 2023

content.text: This month’s tracker shows progress on our cases during January and the data is correct as of 2 February 2023.

Subscribe here to receive automatic monthly updates of our interactive case tracker and view each stage of a case investigation in detail, from initiation stage to the final decision by Secretary of State.
You can view further information about investigations currently in progress on the TRA gov.uk page.
